title: Welcome back, autumn
caption: Welcome back, autumn
desc: If you’re the type of person who has been patiently waiting to grab your comfiest blanket out of the cupboard, then it's time to get excited as we welcome the first official day of autumn – the time of year where the wind gets a little chillier and mother nature has a beautiful colour change. And there’s no better place to witness that change than here in Emerald Lake Park.
copyright: Historic nursery land in Emerald Lake Park, Victoria (© Givenworks/Getty Images)
